To create or Sendible SmartQueue for a given user, make a POST call using basic authentication.

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v2/queue.json

====HTTP Methods:====
PUT

====Parameters:====
 * {{{application_id}}}: Your application id from http://sendible.com/developers.
 * {{{queue_id}}}: The id of the queue to update.
 * {{{queue_name}}}: Optional. The name of the queue. 
 * {{{queue_times}}}: Optional. The queue times to replace the existing ones with. In the format, {{{day_index}}}|{{{hour}}}|{{{minute}}},{{{day_index}}}|{{{hour}}},....,{{{day_index}}}|{{{hour}}}|{{{minute}}} 
day_index of 0 represents Monday. day_index of 6 is Sunday.
For example: 0|11|30,2|14|44 represents: Monday at 11.30, Wednesday at 2.44pm. 

 
====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password or remote API key belonging to the Sendible user.

====Success Response:====
{{{
{
    "queue_times": [],
    "can_repeat": 0,
    "queue_name": "My Queue",
    "id": 9004,
    "user_id": 5131,
    "auto_detect": 0
}
}}}
